title: Conan and the Young Warriors
overview: A time of wizards, warriors and kings. From this time of fantasy and magic strides Conan. He is a warrior, an adventurer, a conqueror, a hero and a legend.Conan's phenomenal strength overcomes the most dangerous situations he faces. He lives by a chivalrous code that values loyalty, honesty and fairness.Naive in the ways of the world, but filled with boundless energy and youthful enthusiasm, Conan's fabulous quest takes him from untamed hills to trackless jungles to insurmountable mountains, frigid glaciers and rushing rivers. He encounters scheming sorcerers, treacherous snake men and winged creatures. He befriends powerful warriors and seafaring pirates.Conan is a man of action - direct, blunt, fearless and ever willing to combat sorcery. Conan's phenomenal strength and courage conquer any enemy.
